column2: TH, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Had a MAJOR wisdom tooth infection like i have never felt before! My wife had extra Tylenol 3 w/codeine and I figured it would subside the pain until i could take care of it. Boy was i wrong !!! I bought every over the counter medicine i could find - nothing worked! DIDNT EVEN TOUCH IT !!! I got my hands on Tramadol - knocked it out completely for about 2-3 hours but would come back. Took so much Tramadol in 24 hours i was sick to my stomach. Anyhow, regarding this drug: I wouldnt waste my time taking it. Its junk.

column2: Female  (Patient)
column9: I've been taking this medicine for well over 3 years now.  Had several major surgeries, and was taking Hydrocodine.  But because of my diabetes, the hydrocodine was giving me a bad reaction.  So T-3 was perscribed and has done a great job for my pain.  I also have body pain (fibromyalgia) and also heel spurs with plantar fascitis, which is very painful.  T-3 do the trick.  I try not to take this on a daily basis if I don't have to, since it certainly can be additing.  But overall, it does do the trick for my chronic pain.I also suffer from occasional migraines.  Unfortunately, T-3 does nothing to alleviate my condition.  I do Imitrex for this.
